path: artifacts/FairLife Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.FairLife: contracts/FairLife Full Smart Contract Security Audit/FairLife

findings.title: TakeFee always true
findings.description: The function _transfer(address from, â€¦) checks for excluded from fee addresses and should disable fees if there are some. But takeFee parameter never turns to false value.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply use loops that can be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: Several owner privilege issues were identified, including the ability to change fees, transaction amounts, charity and marketing addresses, enable/disabled presale modes, lock/unlock, and more.
